name: Dead or Alive Xtreme 3: Saikyou Package
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Dead or Alive Xtreme 3 Venus
- Dead or Alive Xtreme 3 Fortune
- B2 Extreme Poster Set
- Photobook Fortune
- Photobook Venus
- Extreme Sexy Costume F&V Set DLC
- Fortune Playing Cards
- Venus Playing Cards
- Honoka Extreme 3D Mouse Pad
- Marie Rose Extreme 3D Mouse Pad
